title: Please help me.
body:
Konnichiwa minna-san

I have a very important question for you, AD.

Sensei asked me what would be the point of having a kokoro if it cant go dokidoki?

But sensei is a fucking weeb so I dont know what to say.

Is it a trick question? He told me he would kick me out of class if I answered wrong.

I have around 2 hours.

Please, be fast.
